statements: SELECT * FROM preoperative_imaging_data;
SELECT patient_name, image_url FROM preoperative_imaging_data WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM preoperative_imaging_data WHERE image_type = 'X-ray' ORDER BY image_size DESC;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name FROM preoperative_imaging_data WHERE image_size > 1000;
SELECT patient_id, image_url FROM preoperative_imaging_data WHERE image_size < 500 AND image_type = 'MRI';
SELECT patient_name, image_url FROM preoperative_imaging_data WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM preoperative_imaging_data WHERE image_size > 1000 ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT patient_name, image_type FROM preoperative_imaging_data WHERE image_size BETWEEN 500 AND 1000;
SELECT * FROM preoperative_imaging_data ORDER BY image_size ASC, patient_name ASC;
SELECT patient_id, image_url FROM preoperative_imaging_data WHERE image_type = 'X-ray' AND patient_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM imaging_data ORDER BY imaging_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT patient_id, imaging_type FROM imaging_data WHERE imaging_type = 'CT Scan';
SELECT id, image_url, imaging_type FROM imaging_data WHERE patient_id = 101 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM imaging_data WHERE imaging_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT patient_id, COUNT(*) as count FROM navigation_data GROUP BY patient_id HAVING count > 3;
SELECT * FROM imaging_data WHERE imaging_type = 'MRI' ORDER BY imaging_date DESC;
SELECT id, image_url, imaging_date FROM imaging_data WHERE patient_id = 101 ORDER BY imaging_date ASC;
SELECT id, image_url, imaging_type FROM imaging_data WHERE imaging_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM navigation_data WHERE navigation_mode = 'manual' AND patient_id = 201 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT patient_id, navigation_session_id, timestamp FROM navigation_data WHERE navigation_mode = 'auto' ORDER BY patient_id, timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM Preoperative_Imaging;
SELECT patient_id, image_id, image_type FROM Preoperative_Imaging WHERE patient_id = 100;
SELECT surgeon_name, specialty FROM Surgeon WHERE hospital_id = 5 ORDER BY specialty DESC;
SELECT patient_id, procedure_type, procedure_date FROM Surgical_Navigation ORDER BY procedure_date ASC;
SELECT surgeon_name, specialty, hospital_id FROM Surgeon WHERE specialty = 'Cardiology';
SELECT * FROM Preoperative_Imaging LIMIT 10;
SELECT navigation_id, patient_id, procedure_date FROM Surgical_Navigation WHERE procedure_type='MRI';
SELECT surgeon_id, surgeon_name, specialty FROM Surgeon WHERE specialty='Neurosurgery' ORDER BY surgeon_name ASC;
SELECT patient_id, image_id, image_type FROM Preoperative_Imaging JOIN Surgical_Navigation ON Preoperative_Imaging.patient_id = Surgical_Navigation.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM Surgeon WHERE hospital_id IN (SELECT hospital_id FROM Surgical_Navigation WHERE procedure_type = 'Spinal Surgery' LIMIT 5);
SELECT * FROM imaging_data ORDER BY imaging_date ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT patient_id, imaging_type FROM imaging_data WHERE patient_id = 101
SELECT * FROM patient_data WHERE patient_age > 50
SELECT patient_name, patient_age, patient_weight FROM patient_data ORDER BY patient_age DESC
SELECT surgery_id, surgeon_name FROM surgery_data WHERE surgery_type = 'Orthopedic'
SELECT * FROM imaging_data WHERE patient_id = 123;
SELECT imaging_type, COUNT(*) AS num_of_images FROM imaging_data GROUP BY imaging_type;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age, patient_gender FROM patient_data WHERE patient_age > 50 AND patient_gender = 'Female';
SELECT surgery_type, surgeon_name, surgery_date FROM surgery_data ORDER BY surgery_date DESC;
SELECT surgery_id, surgery_date, surgeon_name FROM surgery_data WHERE surgery_type = 'Hip Replacement' AND surgeon_name LIKE 'Dr.%';
SELECT * FROM Preoperative_Imaging;
SELECT image_url, image_type FROM Preoperative_Imaging WHERE date_taken = '2022-01-15';
SELECT name, specialty, hospital FROM Surgeons WHERE specialty = 'Cardiology';
SELECT procedure_name, surgeon_id, date_performed FROM Surgical_Procedures ORDER BY date_performed DESC;
SELECT x_coord, y_coord, z_coord FROM Navigation_Points WHERE point_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM Preoperative_Imaging WHERE patient_id = 1001;
SELECT image_url, image_type FROM Preoperative_Imaging WHERE date_taken >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT p.image_url, s.name, s.specialty FROM Preoperative_Imaging p JOIN Surgeons s ON p.patient_id = s.surgeon_id;
SELECT procedure_name, date_performed, name AS surgeon_name FROM Surgical_Procedures JOIN Surgeons ON Surgeons.surgeon_id = Surgical_Procedures.surgeon_id;
SELECT np.x_coord, np.y_coord, nh.date_time FROM Navigation_Points np JOIN Navigation_History nh ON np.point_id = nh.point_id ORDER BY nh.date_time DESC;
